characters: INT. KARACHI AIRPORT-LOUNGE OFFICE/ JEEP INTERIOR- DAY
S BETWEEN PHONE BOOTH AND OFFICE CABIN
PLANE AS IT REDUCES SPEED ON THE RUNWAY
SAHAP INTPPNATTONAT ATRPORT/CHECK IN APPA NICHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Super: 4th SEPTEMBER 1986 - 9:00 PM KARACHI Birds eye view of Karachi airport. Fully staffed, air planes waiting to take off, cargo being unloaded, luggage trucks driving across, a plane in a distance gently taxing into the runway. The visual sharpens as we switch to a binocular POV. A Board reads - KARACHI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT The binocular pans - Lax airport security staff, saunter about, without the alertness and pace expected at an airport. The binocular pans again and focuses on a small half closed gate- the guards exchange peanuts/snacks chat facing away from the half open gate, leaving the entry easily accessible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Binoculars are put down to reveal AL TURK (45) Stern expression on an intelligent and experienced face. He checks time on his wrist-watch- 9:35 PM. He moves swiftly, gets into a car and drives away, leaving behind a cloud of dust

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. NEERJA’S BUILDING COMPOUND - NIGHT MUMBAI - 9:30 PM. A taxi comes to halt outside a residential complex as we hear a girl’s giggle

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Poocho kitni baar? Saat baar! hall mein! Anand ki toh ek ek line aati hain mujhe

dialogues.speaker: TAXI DRIVER
dialogues.text: Waah waah mere mureed As the girl turns to the taxi driver, we reveal NEERJA BHANOT (23) Big naughty eyes, her natural beauty accentuated by a bright toothy smile.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Mureed? Who’s Mureed? Im Neerja (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The taxi driver sticks his head out as she steps out

dialogues.speaker: TAXI DRIVER
dialogues.text: Arre, mureed maane fan. Jaise ki hum hai yusuf saab ke, maane Dilip kumar ke

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (delighted) Oh, that’s true ! woh toh mai hoon Jatin Khanna maane Rajesh Khanna ki. Acha toh hum chalte hain (she sings) She laughs as she pays him some extra money.

dialogues.speaker: TAXI DRIVER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Thank you didi, allah lambi umr bakshe tumhe

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (Rajesh Khanna style) Zindagi badi honi chahiye, lambi nahi babumoshai! The taxi driver waves and drives away, Neerja enters the complex.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. COMMON COMPOUND, NEERJA’S BUILDING COMPLEX - MOMENTS

dialogues.speaker: LATER
dialogues.text: Neerja walks towards the large garden area, a big banner reads ‘ANNUAL GALA NIGHT’ Everyone is sitting looking bored, the stage is occupied by children dancing to a nursery rhyme. Some people are snacking on samosas, cake with paper plates in their hands and some having Rasna/other colored cold-drink. Neerja’s mother RAMA [(45) classic good looks compromised by a constant frown] is helping the building watchman balance 3-4 snacks and samosa filled paper plates and giving him some instructions about sharing it with others. Neerja spots her father HARISH BHANOT [(48) serious looking man with gentle smile] sitting with a few same- aged men. One of Harish’s friends spots Neerja walking with a bag and purse.

dialogues.speaker: FRIEND
dialogues.text: Aa gayi aapki 3D. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: (really happy to see her) Daddy's darling daughter!

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Oho! khul gayi halwai ki dukaan, aap dono ke dekhte dekhte diabetes ho jaana hain mereko Tipsy the dog runs up to Neerja and starts jumping for her attention.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Shoot kaisa tha? Kitni tired lag rahi ho, ghar chale jao beta Rama enters and takes the frisky Tipsy from Neerja.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Acha hua aa gayi Lado, pareshaan kar diya hain sab ne poochte poochte, Neerja kahaa hain, Neerja kab aayegi, thak gayi hoon mai jawaab dete dete

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Kaam karke aayi yeh, aur thak gayi hai aap? Neerja laughs as she takes some wafers from her dad's plate and munches on it.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Wafers kyun khaa rahi hain? Bhook lagi hain? Paronthia ni khaai? Aur fruit? Maine sab diya toh tha dabbo mein!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (clearly lying) Haan mamma sab khaaya maine. She and her father share a look and Neerja quickly makes an excuse.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: uff, sab itna dull dull hain yahaan! Lets get this party started, with Kaka ji ! Neerja opens her bag and removes a walkman from inside and moves away as Rama places tipsy down. The camera stays on the mother as she removes the casserole in Neerja’s bag and removes the paratha (that Neerja hadn't eaten) and feeds it to Tipsy. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja is at the place where Sharma Sound System’s DJ is playing some nursery rhyme as the kids are continuing to just stroll around on stage/dance area. Neerja shuts the tape and taking the mike...

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Bacha party, very good, now go, (she turns to the building kid) ready? Neerja then removes the cassette from the walkman. It reads ‘My Fav Rajesh Khanna Songs’ and puts it in one of the slots in the dual tape recorder connected to the speaker. She plays a song then immediately stops and rewinds it and plays it again and ‘Bye Bye miss goodnight’ starts playing. She pulls the first set of old people sitting in the front row

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: C’mon everyone! Neerja continues to get everyone on their feet and is not taking a no from a few people hesitant to get into the act. Her mother and Father laugh and are telling their friends that there is no point resisting. Neerja, facing the people standing is coaxing them to follow her lead and shows them Rajesh Khanna’s steps. The song continues as we see the people losing quite a bit of their inhibitions and following Neerja as she continues to dance. She tells her Dad to hold her from behind and signals her mother to do the same. The people get the lead and a train-chain has been formed. People laughing, smiling, enjoying. Neerja’s smile and exuberance is infectious. Amidst all this she spots her oldest brother AKHIL mixing some alcohol from a miniature bottle into a glass. She catches him in the act. sneaking a cigarette, catches him in the act. AKHIL (26) handsome and shy is scared of his younger sister as she has a stern look on her face. Neerja shakes her head as we see a flash and she turns in that direction to see that it is ANEESH(24) cuter younger version of HARISH BHANOT, take the picture. She pulls them both to join the train chain. Music continues, so does the laughter and Rajesh Khanna steps. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bhanot family looks like a happy family together as Rama begins dancing and Neerja copies her. It is very evident that Neerja is a reflection of her mother. Neerja giggles as she returns to the performance area. Neerja takes the lead once again, paying a genuine ode to her favorite movie star, singing the song loudly and dancing in the quintessential Rajesh Khanna style. Everyone claps and cheers her

dialogues.speaker: KARACHI 10
dialogues.text: A car comes to a halt near a market road. Al Turk approaches a crowded biryani stall. The MAN serving some customers immediately spots Al-Turk and calls out to an assistant to assist the customers. Al-Turk takes a corner table in the dingy shop as the MAN comes to take the order. Al-Turk looks up at the MAN and {almost cryptically] orders.

dialogues.speaker: AL-TURK
dialogues.text: Chaar plate biryani. Special waali The MAN walks out of the frame as Al-Turk continues to sit there staring at the busy stall in front of him. The MAN breaks his gaze as he places a polythene bag on the table, and another bag near Al-Turk’s feet. Al-Turk without checking the contents picks both those bags and places a thick wad of notes on the table and walks out. The MAN quickly picks up the bundle of notes and puts them in his Kurta pocket.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. NEERJA’S HOUSE- NIGHT The television is on. Harish, Rama (removing her jewelry and placing it on the table in front of her), Akhil and Aneesh are laughing as Neerja manages a glass of water and at the same time imitating her mother dance.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Hai na bhaiyaa? aisi hi dance kar rahi thi na mamma (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Pare hutt bandar.. soja thodi der, thakti nai hai tu? Neerja picks tipsy in her arms and begins petting it. Aneesh takes a ‘Stardust’ Magazine and begins flipping through it.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Arre haan! Sona chahiye thodi der! mamma aap mujhe thodi der mein utha doge please?

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Tu woh le le na, sick leave. Poora din shoot karke aayi hain....

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Nahi ma jaana padhega..Shanti ne already chutti li hai. Then Neerja looks at Aneesh busy with the magazine.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Aneesh bhaiyya yeh magazine mere liye baahar hi chhod dena please. Mai saath le jaaongi.

dialogues.speaker: ANEESH
dialogues.text: (looking at her weirdly) Tu vaapas aake ke padh lena.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Please bhaiyya. Mujhe plane mein padhni hai.

dialogues.speaker: ANEESH
dialogues.text: Plane mein ni padhegi toh Marjaayegi? aur vaise bhi pichli do baar tu bhool ka aa gayi thi meri magazine. Nothing doing Neerja is clearly unhappy but Aneesh doesn’t care and gets back to his magazine.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Kanjoos. chalo main sonay jaa rahi hoon. Just as she is leaving, a TVC featuring Neerja begins to play on the tele. Akhil calls out to her and she stops to watch the ad. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: AKHIL
dialogues.text: Lado dekh! Teri ad! Kitni aunty type lag rahi hain. Neerja sticks her tongue out in response to her brother's teasing and enters the bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Kyon pareshaan karte rehte ho bechaari ko. Akhil and Aneesh look at each other and laugh.

dialogues.speaker: KARACHI 10
dialogues.text: Two young boys Fahad and Mansoor - [both just about 18 years old] new found moustache and beard slightly growing on their young faces. Fahad is munching on a piece of bread.

dialogues.speaker: FAHAD
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Bhai Bhook lagi hai.

dialogues.speaker: MANSOOR
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Kab se intezaar kar rahe hain Safirini- the 25 year old man looking out through the window doesn’t pay heed to them but another man Khalil [25] big built, bearded face and drugged out eyes looks at the two boys with disdain. Both the boys are almost scared of his glare.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (stern-steely tone) Khana aa jaayega Safirini spots the headlights of a car and turns back to the trio. His weary, withered face looks older than the age of 25. His demeanor and body-language clearly suggests that he is the mentor/leader of the trio sitting there. He turns away from the window.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. BAKERY
dialogues.text: Al-turk arrives in an auto rickshaw and we see a van parked outside [the Pakistan Airport Security Van which we will establish later]. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He gets off with two bags in his hand, enters a shop where a few men in baniyan and lungi are stomping on big pieces of dough. They don’t pay any attention to Al-turk; as if he is a regular there. He continues walking inside into a small passage that leads to a makeshift door. He knocks thrice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fahad and Mansoor look expectantly as Khalil opens the door and in enters Al-Turk with the bags. Fahad and Mansoor get up from the corner they are sitting in and go to the table where the bags are kept. The young boys get the biryanis out while on the same table Khalil and Safirini take out the contents of the other bag- guns, rifle barrels, C4 bars and bullets. The normalcy of the food and guns being removed side by side is quite scary. INT. NEERJA’S HOUSE- LIVING ROOM - NIGHT 5TH SEPTEMBER 1986 1:00 am Rama is kneading dough in the kitchen. We can see potatoes and some green vegetables already prepped to make parathas. Rama looks at the clock it reads 1:00 AM Rama walks into the living room as she unties her apron. She looks at the wall clock again, Harish is working busily on his typewriter. He looks up

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Mujhe pataa hain tum kya soch rahi ho, dus minute sone dogi toh daant padhegi.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Ae wi theek hain,

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. NEERJA’S HOUSE/BEDROOM- NIGHT Rama enters the room, puts the light on and gently wakes Neerja. Tipsy following Rama jumps on the bed and begins waking Neerja by licking her face. Neerja grumbles.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Tch Tipsy! Mamma please, sone do, (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: (gently carrying tipsy and putting it down ) Le! Soja, kissi ne roka hain Rama starts to leave, Neerja pulls her to the bed, and puts her head in her lap. Rama settles her hair affectionately

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Aise mazdooron jaise kaam karna jaroori hain? Modelling enni changi chal rahi hain teri, yeh air hostess job chhod kyun ni dendi

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Mamma I love my air hostess job

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Yehi toh saara siyappa hain! Tere flight pe chadte hi blood pressure high ho jaanda hain mera. Tera plane utaarta hain uske saath mera pressure.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Aur samose khao meri flight ko blame karo, maine dekha toh aapko kal, teen khaaye na? Neerja turns away giggling

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Chal uth ab! She pulls Neerja back

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. INTERCUTS BETWEEN NEERJA’S HOUSE BEDROOM AND BAKERY

dialogues.speaker: HOUSE
dialogues.text: Neerja putting her make-up on. Fahad and Mansoor washing their faces. Neerja wearing her uniform. Khalil, Fahad and Mansoor wearing some uniform as Al-turk and Safirini watch them. Safirini is dressed in a pathani with a waist-coat. Neerja wears the Pan Am badge (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Reveal the Karachi men’s uniform read Pakistan Airport Security Neerja checks her bag and shuts the suitcase The Karachi men shut a heavy trunk with guns and grenades in it. Safirini, Khalil, Fahad, Mansoor and Al-turk are standing in a circle and and saying the Martyr's prayer MARTYR’S PRAYER (in Arabic) Hum mehnat karne waale hain. Hum tayyar hain. Hum apne maqsad ke liye kuch bhi kar sakte hain. Iss magsad mein humaari jeet hogi.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. NEERJA’S HOUSE - NIGHT Neerja sits with her head bowed, in front of a big idol of Goddess Durga. Rama appears from behind

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Leh! INT. NEERJA’S HOUSE- NIGHT C/u of Neerja’s hand held by Rama, its bare.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Kya matbal mil ni ri? Mai keya si na, uttarna nai hain iss ring ko Neerja exchanges a look with Harish sitting at the table, Rama tosses Neerja’s hand away. Neerja is packing her vanity bag with the contents that are currently on the table. Make-up, lip-stick, hair accessories, etc. She remembers some VHS tapes, puts them in a plastic bag and shoves them in her big bag. Rama displeased, walks into the kitchen and gets some freshly cooked parathas and places it on the table. Neerja is wearing her lipstick as Rama continues..

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Toofaan mail jaise phirna hain, yaa se waa, itne kaam kar leti hain din mein, ek ring ni sambhaal sakti? Maine pandit ji se special teri safety ke liye li thi (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (rajesh khanna style) Arey meri pyaari maa..agar yeh hota toh voh nahi hota aur agar voh nahi hota toh shaayad yeh bhi nahi hota..hota toh vohi hai na jo ho na hota hai..kya samjhe. Neerja takes her lipstick and pretends to apply it on Rama’s lips as Rama irritated, pushes Neerja’s hands away.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Waah kaka ji! kaunsi film ka dialogue hai yeh? Neerja struggles with wearing her earrings

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (still rajesh khanna style) Arey nadaan yeh toh original hai re. Harish and Neerja laugh.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: (irritated) Humor sense kitta jyaada changa hain aap dono ki Hehe

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (giggling) ; Mamma humor sense nai, sense of humor! And I’1l be safe I promise The conversation is interrupted by a car horn Neerja quickly gets up from her seat, plants swift kisses on her parents cheeks and is about to run out when her mother stops her and gives her yogurt and sugar. Neerja gulps it and hurries out of the house with her bags in tow.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Parothian khud bhi kha lena, sab baant mat dena. (suddenly remembering)Hai rabba! Laado tera toh birthday hain 7 ko, miss ho jaayega! Neerja gets her shoes from the shoe rack and starts putting them on

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Mamma birthday New York mein! Lekin mera gift leke rakhna! bhoolna mat Ok Bye (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Arre par chaiye kya...

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Daatne mein itne busy ho ke yeh bhi yaad nahi, maine dikhaya tha na woh yellow waala salwar suit? Mujhe wahi waala chaiye mamma, jiske dupatta mein woh chamki tha..

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Acha Haan! mai kal hi le aaongi, dhyaan se jaane beta, bye Neerja rushes out waving Rama and Harish walk to the window and look at Jaideep (29) handsome, shy is waiting for Neerja. He spots them and waves to them from below-nervously smiling.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: (pensive) Mujhe Jaideep ke baare mein pehle hi soch lena tha Rama, Lado ke liye isse behtar ladka nahi ho sakta, pataa nahi kyun maine uss Naresh se.. Rama looks at her husband’s guilt-ridden face and lovingly smiles at him. She places her hands on his and begins sweetly singing ‘Ajeeb Dastan hai yeh...’ Both of them watch Jaideep and Neerja drive away

dialogues.speaker: KARACHI
dialogues.text: Al-turk looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: AL-TURK
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Chalo.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Mansoor- Fahad.. sab samaan gaadi mein daal do. Mansoor and Fahad pick the heavy trunk and follow Khalil outside. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Safirini walks up to Al-turk. Safirini and Al-turk are in a serious conversation as Safirini is fidgeting with something under his kurta.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Mansoor aur Fahad theek se kar paayenge? Training poori hain na inki? Safirini takes the last sip from his cup trying to hide the concern on his face.

dialogues.speaker: AL-TURK
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Haan Haan, kaam ke pakke hain dono, Mujhe yahaan poori tafseel milti rahegi, Ab hum milenge Cyprus mein Safirini keeps the cup on the table.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. OUTSIDE BAKERY/HOUSE- NIGHT
dialogues.text: Khalil is watching the boys place the trunk in the back of a van. The camera reveals- Pakistan Airport Security written on it. All of them get into the car with Khalil in the driver's seat. Khalil shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. CAR/BOMBAY ROADS
dialogues.text: Jaideep is driving and Neerja is seated next to him. She is winding a un-spooled cassette with a pen. Their body language clearly suggests that they are very comfortable with each other.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (Russian accent) I want to stay home and sleep, but instead I have to go on plane and serve strangers like they are family. Jaideep chuckles

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Bade exposed ho gaye ho Babumoshai! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Hanste hi rahoge ke kuch bologe bhi? Ab mujhe german accent mein batao tumhara din kaisa tha

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: din baut busy tha, Accent mujhe aata nahi,

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Waise toh mujhe bolne ka mauka nahi dete, humesha airport ke raaste pe hi itna chup kyun ho jaate ho?

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (teases) Woh issiliye kyunki mai tumhe bahut dhyaan se sunta hoon

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: How sweet!

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Mai ek baar full and final samajh jaana chahta hoon ke tumhari awaaz ka kaunsa part mujhe sabse zyaada annoying lagta hain, tone, volume, accent

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Haww! Is this true? meri awaaz itni annoying hain ke uska analysis karna hain

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (dead serious) Haan. Neerja sulks

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: But.. its very strange, jab tum nahi hoti na, toh mujhe tumhari awaaz hi sabse zyaada yaad aati hain

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Haan haan kaan mein bajne waali annoying awaaz

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Arre nahi, tumhari awaaz mujhe kaan se nahi dil se sunai deti hain babumoshai, I miss you and always with your annoying voice (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Neerja smiles appeased

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Tum mujhe miss karte ho

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Of course!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Oh oh ! aage se left jaldi!

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Lekin airport?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Please please do minute LONG SHOT OF THE CAR TAKING THE LEFT TURN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja and Jaideep have halted. Neerja turns to Jaideep and smiles

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: dekho mai bahut ache ghar ka ladka hoon, I dont like where this is going. Neerja giggles she whacks him playfully and points out of her window. Jaideep moves closer to her to see where she is pointing

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Tadaa! See! Jaideep turns to see it is a huge BENZER hoarding of Neerja as a bride. Jaideep briefly taken by how beautiful she looks, breaks the moment

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Itna bhi nahi miss karoonga tumhe

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Babumoshai yeh tumhara birthday present (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He gets a few chocolates and a letter out of a the glove compartment, he gives only the chocolates first

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (British accent) Wow snickers! my favorite! Oh but Jai-Deep how daft are you?

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Daft?? pataa hain kitni mehnat karni padhi

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (french accent) Serves you right mes cherie, you give chocolates to a air hostess, one I have to watch my weight, two I travel the world and can get these anytime. What is that in your hand? She points to the sealed envelope in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (with purpose) Yeh tum sirf aur sirf apne birthday pe khol sakti ho, aur chocolates wapis kar do, tumhe toh kahi bhi kabhie bhi mil sakti hain He gives her the letter. She takes the letter and the chocolates

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (italian accent) Dont be rude, you cannot take back a gift, stupid man. Now drive, I am late! Drive I say!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (rajesh khanna accent) Oh chal na re, nahi toh late ho jaayenge re Jaideep drives chuckling

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: By the way, you make a beautiful bride Babumoshai. Neerja gives him a perfunctory smile and stares out of the window as they drive away.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja continues to talk and giggle as Jaideep reacts, smiles and listens to her. C/U of Neerja tenderly holding the chocolates and the letter - maybe her fingers grazing the envelope as if curious to know what is written in it. Jaideep asks for a chocolate as he is feeling hungry and she cutely refuses as if saying they are all mine.

dialogues.speaker: LOVE SONG CONTINUES
dialogues.text: The car door opens- Jaideep and Neerja have reached the airport. Jaideep removes the one small bag and then picks her Vanity bag. He pretends to be dragged down by the weight of that bag.

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Ooh! Badaa bhaari bag hain bhai!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (laughs ) Tumhe kya lagta hain? aise lagna (she gestures to herself) chota mota kaam hain?

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Mujhe lagta hain tumhare liye toh kaam hi nahi hain Neerja blushes, they both look at each other and smile. Neerja picks her bags. Slight nervous silence between them.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Acha toh hum chalte hain!

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (looks at his watch) Ruko abhi time hain, its 2:27, three minutes more Neerja [face away from Jaideep] smiles and then turns. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (smiling naughtily) teen minute mein kya ho jaayega ?

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (rajesh khanna style) Kissi badi khushi ke intezaar mein hum yeh choti choti khushiyoon ke mauke kho dete hain

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Bawarchi! wow you watched a Rajesh Khanna Film! Great!

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (whispers ) Tum jaanti nahi lekin Kaka ji mere liye bahut badaa kaam karne waale hain

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (mocking) Acha? Woh kaise? Jaideep looks at her with a lover’s yearning, admiring her childlike laughter. He is about to tell her something when they are interrupted by two young girls- Tina and Debina[22-24 years old], dressed in Pan-Am air-hostess uniforms, almost identical looking because of the make-up and hair-style. Suddenly Neerja is blushing and slightly on guard.

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Hi Jaideep, Tina humaari kismet mein toh khadoos company drivers hi likhe hai, don’t you wish humaara bhi pick up itna cute hota Jaideep blushes

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: chalo we are late! She pulls Neerja

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: C'mon! Bye Jaideep! Neerja caught between colleagues at the last moment Manages only a sideways embrace with Jaideep, his face falls

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Half-hug? Really? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Pst (she points her chin to Tina and Debina and makes a sad face) She quickly turns to see Tina and Debina laughing at her as she walks towards the entrance of the airport. Jaideep is waiting for her to turn back and he suddenly remembers something.

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: (calls out) Neerja, Letter! birthday pe kholna!

dialogues.speaker: LOVE SONG CONTINUES
dialogues.text: But Neerja doesn’t turn and he watches her walk inside. Slightly disappointed he turns back when suddenly he is surprised by arms around his neck- Neerja’s. She hugs him tight and whispers

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Letter birthday pe hi kholoongi, I’‘1l miss you, bye Jaideep happily turns as Neerja makes a cute funny face, lands a quick peck on the lips [surprising Jaideep], and runs back.

dialogues.speaker: JAIDEEP
dialogues.text: Bye bye, miss good night LAST BIT OF THE LOVE SONG - MUSIC FADES OUT. SCENE CONTINUES EXT/ SAHAR INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT.iN2.—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beaming Neerja walks towards Tina and Debina waiting for her. Both of them smile and look happy for Neerja. As they walk towards the gate leading to the entrance of the airport and wade through the crowd of people in and around the airport, Debina begins talking.

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Jaideep is so cute, Neerja ab toh tum shaadi kar hi lo

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Kar Le Neerja, nahi toh yeh kar legi! she has big crush on Jaideep (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Everyone laughs, Neerja doesn’t pay heed to the joke as she is lost in thought. Debina squeezes Neerja’s hand and whispers

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Oh C’mmon Neerja, purani baatien bhool ja, be cool. woh shaadi arranged thi, yeh love hain, zindagi ko ek aur mauka toh de kar dekh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kitchen counter is piled with take out boxes. Neerja, still very much the blushing bride, arms covered with the traditional ‘chooda’ a spot of sindoor on her forehead, is organizing the boxes and pulling out serving trays and bowls. She reacts to some loud laughter from the living room. Just then her husband Naresh (28)serious looking with a no nonsense attitude, appears, he has the bill for the food in his hand, he checks it in disdain.

dialogues.speaker: NARESH
dialogues.text: Tumhari maa bhi aisi hi hain kya? apne pati se home delivery karwaati rehti hain? For a second Neerja doesn’t know how to react but then assuming he is joking,

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Meri mamma bahut acha khana banaati hain!

dialogues.speaker: NARESH
dialogues.text: Toh shaadi se pehlay seekh leti unse. ke tumhe independent banaane ke chakkar mein kuch sikhaya hi nahi

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (a little hurt) I promise main jaldi seekh jaaongi.

dialogues.speaker: NARESH
dialogues.text: Problem pataa hain kya hain Neerja, hume apni shakal dikhane ke paise nahi milte, hume mehnat karni padhti hain. Aur dekho, meri mehnat ke paise kisme jaa rahe hain? Khana order karne mein. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NARESH
dialogues.text: Yeh saara kharcha mein darling daughter ke daddy se vasool karoonga, Khana banaana tak nahi sikhaya tumahri maa ne tumhe Tsk Tsk Tsk Neerja is stunned. She doesn’t know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Tum har baat mein mamma ko mat laao please? hum manage kar lenge She picks up a plate of food to take it outside. Naresh takes it from her

dialogues.speaker: NARESH
dialogues.text: (angrily) Tum yahi raho, mai le jaaoonga. Neerja picks up another plate

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (trying to make light of the situation) Khaana banaana nahi aata lekin serve toh karna aata hi hai. waise bhi mai tumhare doston ko hi toh bol loon, I don’t want to be rude Naresh extends his arms towards the wall and blocks Neerja from going any further.

dialogues.speaker: NARESH
dialogues.text: Jaisa mai boloon waise karo. Yahi raho, baahar. Mat. Aana. Samjhi. Yeh sab saaf kaun karega? Naresh continues to glare at a scared Neerja and takes the tray from her hands. Naresh walks out as Neerja is stunned with Naresh’s behavior. She starts clearing the counter and throwing empty boxes, wrappers into the bin.

dialogues.speaker: FRIEND, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Bhai aur kitna chupaayega apni model biwi ko?

dialogues.speaker: NARESH, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Maine bola usse aane ko lekin pata nahi kehti hai ussay baahar nahi aana hai.

dialogues.speaker: FRIEND, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Karne de naatak. Nayi nayi shaadi hai na. Dheere dheera line pe le aana usko. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: All the friends laugh, Neerja looks hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja, wearing dark glasses, gets out of the mall carrying two big shopping bags. Her body language isn’t that of the happy chirpy girl we are used to seeing so far. She walks up to a small tuck shop at the street corner, the SHOP OWNER (50) cheerful chubby Pakistan man greets her warmly He takes the land phone and places it in front of her, she smiles gratefully and dials [FLASHBACK 1 CONTINUES] INT. HT OFFICE/ HARISH’S CABIN-

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Neerja’s father is giving his feedback about an article to a junior journalist.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Article toh theek hain, lekin tumhe nahi lagta tum kuch important bhool gaye ho?

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: (smiles) Nahi main waise hi pooch raha hoon.

dialogues.speaker: JUNIOR JOURNO
dialogues.text: (unsurely self- eritical) Uhh..sir..punctuation?! He is about to say something further when the phone rings

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Hello Papa? How are you?

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: (joy on his face) hello mere 3D, How are you? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Mai..mai theek hoon papa

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Aaj office mein kaise phone kiya? Mamma ko bataaoonga ki Daddy’s Darling Daughter ne sirf mujhse baat karne ke liye phone kiya toh badaa naraaz ho jaayegi, she’1ll be so jealous! [laughs] Neerja doesn’t respond and there is a few seconds’ silence.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Kya hua beta? Is everything ok? It is clear that there is a lot she wants to talk about but controlling the quiver in her voice she replies

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Papa woh mera ad hain agle mahine, aap uss agency ko phone karke bol do mai nahi aa paaoongi. Unka business card mere cupboard...

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Ek minute ek minute, kyun nahi aaogi beta?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Papa I think I should stop modelling, shaadi ke baad acha nahi lagta yeh sab karna

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: (surprised) What? Yeh kaisi ajeeb si baatien kar raho ho Laado, kis idiot ne kahaa yeh sab tumhe, Naresh ko bataaya? He’ll laugh (he laughs)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Papa Naresh ne hi kahaa mujhe, unhe nahi lagta mujhe modelling karni chahiye, aap cancel kardo please Harish gets the vibe of what Neerja is implying.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Bhai yeh toh galat baat hain, we've discussed this. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: shaadi se pehle unn sab ne bola tha they will let you work, mai Naresh se baat karoon beta? He’1l understand...

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (gets frightened at the thought) Nahi papa, please aap Naresh se kuch mat kehna, Please papa, (her voice breaks) Mamma se kehna I miss her, aur Aneesh aur Akhil bhaiya se bhi. Harish reacts to her tears

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Lado, bache, pehle toh hausla rakho, hausla hume har tagqleef se nikaal sakta hain. Doosra, galat baat, na karna na sehna, teesra...

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (finishes the sentence) Pehla aur doosra kabhie nahi bhoolna Harish smiles

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: That’s my girl! Ab tum hi agar haanji haanji karne lag jaaogi toh kaise chalega. bahadur bacha kaun?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (smiles) Mai Neerja hangs up the phone and looks into her purse, fishes through it, then looks up embarrassed

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Uncle mai next time de doo paise?

dialogues.speaker: SHOP OWNER
dialogues.text: Dont worry bache, abba se baat ho gayi, bas. He gives her a chocolate and smiles kindly, Neerja melts, as she has been completely bereft of kindness and affection, she smiles through her tears

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Thank you (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: She walks away from the shop feeling strong.

dialogues.speaker: MUMBAI- 3
dialogues.text: Camera pulls back from Neerja’s face as she is holding the intercom phone. She gets information from Dolly.

dialogues.speaker: DOLLY
dialogues.text: All equipment is correct in number and serviceable

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Thank you Dolly. Neerja clicks a button.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: What’s the status Ramesh?

dialogues.speaker: RAMESH
dialogues.text: All equipment is correct in number and serviceable

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Thank you. Neerja places the receiver back and walks towards the staircase leading to the Upper Section/ Cockpit area

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja reaches the upper section and asks the Male steward stationed there for a status update. He gives her a thumbs up. Neerja turns in the direction of the cockpit and knocks on the door. The door is opened by one of the co-pilots.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Hello. I am Neerja Bhanot and I am the head purser for this flight. CAPT. SNIPES. Hello Miss Bhanot. All set? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Absolutely! We are raring to go Captain Snipes CAPT. SNIPES. great!

dialogues.speaker: CO-PILOT BERTRAND
dialogues.text: Comment Allez Vous Miss. Bhanot?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Je vais bien Captain. Bertrand.

dialogues.speaker: CO-PILOT BERTRAND
dialogues.text: All checks done?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Yes Sir

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN SNIPES
dialogues.text: Excellent, Adrien, Richard and I are done with our technical checks too. All we need is some fuel at Karachi and lame lay over in Frankfurt. I wish we could fly straight to New York!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Oh no! Please! We need the lame lay over captain, we need more food and wine for the passengers! So can we begin boarding? CAPT. SNIPES. Yes, please, lets get this show on the road Neerja thanks all of them and gets out of the cockpit and takes the stairs to return to the lower section of the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja walks down the stairs towards the front door. She informs the ground staff.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: We are ready for boarding.

dialogues.speaker: KARACHI 3
dialogues.text: The Pakistan Airport security van drives through the darkness. The passengers in the car are sitting silently. Khalil’s POV- he sees a police checkpoint a few metres away and slows the speed of the car. He looks scared and then through the rear-view looks at Safirini.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Agar roke toh jaise maine samjhaya hain waise karna Mansoor and Fahad wipe their nervously sweating faces. The car approaches the checkpoint and they are stopped by the cops. The cops point their flashlights inside causing the passengers to squint. The cop looks at them intently and then asks them for their ID’s. All of them reach out to their pockets [Fahad and Mansoor’s hands on their guns] when Khalil speaks up.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (urdu) Diplomat Sahab hai Libya ke humaare saath, unhe ruksat karne aaye hain Khalil asks Safirini to show his Diplomat Passport. Mansoor and Fahad are nervously staring ahead ready to use the gun as the cops check the passport. On being satisfied with what he has seen the cop salutes Safirini the diplomat and signals the cops at the barricade to let the vehicle pass. Everyone in the car breathes a sigh of relief and the two young boys ease the grip on the gun as Khalil gets back to the driver's seat and drives through the barricade.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: (Off- Screen) Pan Am flight 73 to New York is ready to Board. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Kindly request all passengers to board the flight from Gate no.3 A first time flyer, Anand Parekh- 22 years old is restlessly waiting to get out of the bus to board the flight. A couple of buses are seen driving towards the plane. Establish a few of the passengers. Some of them looking out of the window and the huge plane on which is written ‘Clipper Empress of the Seas’ Both buses come and halt near the wing of the plane and an airport authority staff member allows a Pan- Am attendant to walk out with 3 kids. Gopal is patiently waiting with his 5 month pregnant wife Babita as he watches people jostle to get out of the bus and into the plane.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Tina, Debina and Neerja are waiting in the front section ready to welcome the passengers now climbing the stairs while Sanjana and Dolly are manning the rear gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Pan Am attendant comes towards Neerja with 2 girls 8-9 years old and a boy of almost the same age.

dialogues.speaker: ATTENDANT
dialogues.text: Hi Neerja three UNMs traveling to Frankfurt

dialogues.speaker: BHAVIK
dialogues.text: My Name is Bhavik Desai she is my sister Rekha Desai and he is my cousin Jatin. We are not UNM, we are SRJ (she points to each corresponding Initial) Neerja smiles

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Bhavik UNM matlab Unaccompanied Minors. Aap apne mamma papa ke bina plane mein travel kar rahe ho na, toh aapka dhyan rakhne ke special responsibility meri hain. I’m Neerja, come! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Neerja lovingly takes the kids to their seats, she helps them puts their bags in the overhead compartment and kneels down to the kids’ level and lovingly smiles at them. Jatin is nervously fidgeting with a toy aeroplane. NEERJA. Ab kuch hi der mein mummy papa mil jaayenge. Excited?

dialogues.speaker: BHAVIK
dialogues.text: Yes I am but Jatin is scared.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Arre isme darne ki kya baat hain[looking at the toy in his hand] tum pilot banna chahte ho na

dialogues.speaker: JATIN
dialogues.text: Haan

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (smiling at his innocence) Tumhari mumma ne bataaya, mai pilot se boloon tumhe ek flying lesson dene ko? Jatin’s eyes light up

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Nahi? Tumhe darr lagega na?

dialogues.speaker: JATIN
dialogues.text: No no I want to go to pilot! Please aunty! Neerja smiles

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Ok done Jatin is very excited all of a sudden and vigorously nods his head.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Aap sab ke passports, bag mein rakh doon? Bhavik hands over the 3 passports to Neerja as she gets up and reaches out to the overhead compartment to keep the passports.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. SAHAR AIRPORT/STAIRS/BUS
dialogues.text: People get down from the bus and begin queuing up. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The Hassan family are first people to board from the rear entrance of the plane A hassled looking Hanif, managing all the bags and a child- Nasiah tugging at his pants, has all the passports in his hand. When Neeraj- a young man in his mid 20's comes and hands over a passport and boarding card that Hanif had dropped. Shakeela and Hanif both thank Neeraj as he smiles and leaves them with Shakeela grumbling at Hanif for being irresponsible. Hanif ignores the woman’s mumbling like an experience husband does as he orders his still arguing children to get on the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. SAHAR AIRPORT/PLANE
dialogues.text: Quick establishing shots of the kind of passengers flying with names on the boarding cards Camera pans through the people walking into the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few more passengers have entered followed by a young Indian with his slowly walking grandmother - Rahul Kumar and Sujata Kumar. Behind them is the nervous passenger Anand Parekh Sujata Kumar compliments Tina and Debina for their beauty. Sujata has in a way halted traffic behind her and Anand Parekh is restlessly trying to figure a way to pass through her but cannot.

dialogues.speaker: SUJATA
dialogues.text: Kitti pyari hai dono! Tum dono ki shaadi ho gayi? Mera pota, Amreeca mein settle hain! Milogi? She points at Rahul who is embarrassed and doesn’t know where to look, he mouths an apology to Debina and gently nudges his grandmother along. SUJATA (CONT’D) (conspirational) Baad mein baat karenge.. Debina half-smiles at Rahul. Sujata lovingly tells him not to be embarrassed and walks away from there but not before telling the girls she will talk to them in the plane. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Anand Parekh shows his boarding pass and smiles at Tina as she points to the direction of his seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hanif and his wife Shakeela’s teenage son Jannat and daughter Aliya are arguing with each other as the father Hanif Hassan [45 years old] is overloaded with everyone's hand bags.

dialogues.speaker: JANNAT
dialogues.text: I’1l sit with Abbu

dialogues.speaker: ALIYA
dialogues.text: No I'll sit with Abbu

dialogues.speaker: JANNAT
dialogues.text: I’ll sit, you see Sanjana and Dolly smile and point the Hassan family towards their seats as a few more passengers enter. Hanif Hassan’s kids are now almost quarrelling with each other to sit with Hanif but he is busy stowing the many bags he has in the overhead compartments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An executive looking foreigner [who Tina was checking out earlier] -among many others. By this time Neerja has come back to her spot. As Tina takes the boarding pass from the foreigner- Carl Malone

dialogues.speaker: CARL
dialogues.text: Look forward to flying with you today.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: We do too sir. Carl smiles as Tina blushes and then stops when Neerja and Sanjana stare at her authoritatively.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: What?! I’m doing my job!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (stifling a smile) Yeah right. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A few more passengers enter followed by a scrawny looking hippy man- Ronnie Heston-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopal is helping his 5 month pregnant wife Babita into the plane Sanjana and Dolly smile at them and allow them to enter, Gopal insists on taking Babita’s bag.

dialogues.speaker: GOPAL
dialogues.text: Babita dhyaan se please. And no ulti till we take off ok?

dialogues.speaker: BABITA
dialogues.text: (not amused) Not funny, Gopal Gopal smiles and gently guides her through the aisle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plans is half full with passengers as a few of the cabin crew members are helping the passengers get comfortable. Neerja moves towards the galley, takes a few sweets from a tray in front of her and goes towards the Desai kids and gives it to them.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Don’t tell anybody ok. She winks at the kids and moves ahead. Camera follows Neerja as she walks towards the first class section for final checks. The Cabin Crew are seen busily completing their formalities. Some checking the safety of the galley stations while some roaming around the aisle telling the passengers to buckle up and straighten their seats. The camera reveals the passengers reading newspapers, pressing the call-buttons, asking for water as the other air-hostesses smile and go about their duty. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A couple passenger reading an Indian Magazine spot a full page ad of a brand featuring Neerja and as she approaches them they do a double-check. Neerja smiles as they show her the ad and passes them by. The camera shows Tina serving Carl Malone a drink. He looks at her and smiles flirtatiously and so does Tina. Just then their eye contact is broken by Heston (sitting next to Malone)

dialogues.speaker: HESTON
dialogues.text: Wow! Row 13!

dialogues.speaker: CARL MALONE
dialogues.text: Oh is that unlucky for you?

dialogues.speaker: HESTON
dialogues.text: I hope not, I only have half hour for my connecting flight. I hope we make it in time to Frankfurt.

dialogues.speaker: CARL MALONE
dialogues.text: You better keep your fingers crossed that the plane is on time

dialogues.speaker: HESTON
dialogues.text: I will. I have faith, the hills teach you that. Heston smiles

dialogues.speaker: CARL MALONE
dialogues.text: You a climber? Heston nods, we leave them as they continue their conversation Neerja gives her command to start the safety demonstration through the PA system

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4:00 AM- Mumbai Pilot’s POV - the airport guy on the tarmac with the UV baton guiding the plane out of the parking area. Long-Shot of the plane on the runway as the pilot is heard. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN. SNIPES
dialogues.text: (heavy American Accent) Namaste deviyon aur sajjano and Good morning to all of you. Mera Naam hai captain Jack Snipes And with me are co-Pilots Adrien Bertrand and Richard King. Welcome to Pan Am 73 flying to New York via Karachi and Frankfurt. The time is 4:00 Am India time we hope to land in Karachi in 40 minutes. Quick fact about this flight - Your captain that is me is learning Hindi. By the time we reach New York please tell me ‘Mera Hindi Kaisi thi’. In return I promise a smooth take off and landing’ Passengers reactions - some laughing some indifferent.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (on the PA system) Crew to arm all doors and cross check The flight takes off.

dialogues.speaker: INT. PLANE- NIGHT
dialogues.text: Neerja and Debina are sitting next to each other, both strapped securely in their jump seats, Neerja puts her hand in her pocket and half removes the letter Jaideep gave her

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Whats that?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Jaideep ne di hain She smiles shyly

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Ooh! Love letter! so romantic! Khol khol!

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: No no, yeh mai sirf aur sirf birthday pe khol sakti hoon (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Arre khol na, I also want to see, usse kaise pataa chalega aaj kholi ki kal, pst, come on, open it Neerja looks tempted, Debina pulls out the letter, Neerja snatches it back

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Aye! Give it back! And No! Mai abhi nahi kholoongi, aur tumhare saamne toh bilkul nahi! She puts the letter back in her pocket as Debina laughs

dialogues.speaker: DEBINA
dialogues.text: Fine! Miss goody two shoes! Just then they are distracted by the sound of a passenger call. She puts the letter away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5:00 AM Karachi The van is waiting in the cover of darkness. Fahad and Mansoor are both standing in a corner. Safirini has removed his waist-coat and is fidgeting with something under his pathani [wearing the explosives laden belt - maybe don’t reveal it now] Khalil opens the back of the van and slides the trunk towards him and calls out to Fahad and Mansoor. Safirini opens the trunk - guns, grenades, bullet magazines neatly placed Safirini passes the guns to Khalil who in turn passes it to the young boys. Mansoor looks overwhelmed. Khalil holding a gun in his hand..

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Ek aur baar. tees second ki training hai na teri? Phir se kar! Mansoor’s hands are trembling and he almost drops the gun. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Gadhe! yeh tere haath kyun kaap rahe hain. Darpok! Safirini approaches..

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Khalil! He gives Khalil a dirty look then addresses Fahad and Mansoor.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Darre hua mat rehna, ab hum daraayenge apne plan ke mutabik chalna hain.Bas. Safirini stares angrily at Khalil as Mansoor nods, still affected.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Chal phir se koshish kar Mansoor manages to get it right this time.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Himmat rakh Mansoor. Issi din ki tayyari itni shiddat se ki hain tune. himmat. Safirini pats Mansoor on his back as Khalil walks towards the van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5:15 AM Karachi The lights in the plane comes on as Neerja announces.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Pan Am flight 73 will land at Karachi International Airport shortly. Please fasten your seat- belts and ensure that your seat is upright. For those deplaning in Karachi in thank you for choosing Pan Am airways. Neerja keeps the PA receiver and walks towards the kids. She retouches the bedsheet on the 3 sleeping kids.  38 39 38

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The foursome watch the plane land on the tarmac. Fahad and Mansoor look at each other nervously while Safirini and Khalil have the look as if to suggest that the hour of reckoning is here.

dialogues.speaker: PLANE AS IT REDUCES SPEED ON THE RUNWAY
dialogues.text: WHEEL COMING TO A HALT —

dialogues.speaker: INT. PLANE- NIGHT
dialogues.text: Neerja is standing at the gate with a file in her hand as Tina and Debina are smiling and thanking the passengers disembarking.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: His name is Carl Malone.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Kaun?

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Arey that cute guy in business class 13K. Neerja makes a face as Pan Am officer enters and smiles at the ladies waiting at the entrance. Neerja hands over the file in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: No issues with the flight. The Pan Am official takes the file, thanks the air- hostess and turns around. Coming up the stairs in an urgent manner is Imran Ali- the radio engineer with a wide smile on his 40-45 year old face.

dialogues.speaker: IMRAN ALI
dialogues.text: Asalaam walekum. Had a good flight?

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Of course Imran bhai.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (naughtily) Tumhe kab se humaari itni fikr hone lagi Imrani Ali. I know why you are being so sweet. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Imran Ali pretends to be upset.

dialogues.speaker: IMRAN ALI
dialogues.text: Neerja humaari humdardi ka mazaak banaa rahi hain aap. And walks inside.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Arey aap toh naraaz ho gaye Tina and Debina are smiling at each other knowing that he is teasing Neerja.

dialogues.speaker: IMRAN ALI
dialogues.text: (gives up the pretense and smiles) Naaraz aur tumse? Ho hi nahi sakta, thoda kaam bhi kar liya jaaye? Kya khayal hain? Neerja smiles and bows as she welcomes him inside, Imran Ali walks towards the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. KARACHI AIRPORT
dialogues.text: Security guards are doing last minute checks as the passengers are showing their passports and boarding passes as a van with one lot of passengers leaves towards the plane. The van reaches the huge jumbo as the camera reveals the name of the plane 'Clipper Empress of the Seas' Airport staff can be seen busy around the plane - the baggage guys unloading bags, a refuelling tanker and a few people around it, couple of engineers talking amongst themselves as they do the routine checks. People begin to get into the plane through two doors. A couple of security guards are manning each door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safirini and Khalil are seated in the front seat of the van while Fahad and Mansoor are sitting behind. Safirini ignites the engine and looks through the overhead rear-view mirror. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Safirini’s POV as he is instructing the trio - The refuelling truck drives away from the plane, the mini-bus after dropping the first batch of passengers has left too.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Fahad, Mansoor, plane mein jao peeche ke darwaze se Then adjusting something inside his kurta he talks to Khalil.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Mai aur Khalil aage se chadhenge aur tumhe...

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Pataa hain. Pilots ko kabu mein karke cockpit ko control karna hai. Khalil’s eyes reveal his evil excitement for things to come. Safirini looks ahead, turns the headlights on and then accelerates the car towards a small barricade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The radio engineer comes down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van crashes through the barricade and swerves on the tarmac. Safirini and Gang have their eyes on the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilots sharing a joke with each other are also doing their last-minute status check of the equipment.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. VAN/TARMAC
dialogues.text: Safirini is pushing the pedal harder as the van zooms towards the plane.  4l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 48 People are still settling down and Neerja tells Tina to take a round through the aisle. Imran Ali approaches Neerja waiting at the starboard side.

dialogues.speaker: IMRAN ALI
dialogues.text: Lambi flight aur itna load? Tayyar ho?

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: We are ever ready Imran! Neerja is removing something from the overhead compartment- they are VHS tapes Imran Ali excitedly takes them and looks at the titles.

dialogues.speaker: IMRAN ALI
dialogues.text: Neerja, ehsaanfaramosh nahi hoon lekin kabhie toh Kissi aur ka VHS laa diya karo! Har baar rajesh Khanna! bhai hume toh Amitabh Bachcan zyaada pasand hain Neerja frowns

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Waapis do. Imran laughs, she tries to pull the tapes he keeps them and holds his ear with the other hand apologizing

dialogues.speaker: IMRAN ALI
dialogues.text: Tauba! Their conversation comes to an abrupt end when they hear a £ few gunshots. Both look at each other wondering what really has happened outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van comes closer to the plane. The security guards at the front door turn in the direction of the van and so do the guys unloading the bags but even before they can react, they are shot at by the terrorists from the van, killing everybody. The Stair-van drivers shield themselves inside the van. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The van comes to a screeching halt and Fahad and Mansoor rush out and run towards the 2nd door and on the way shoot the security guards at the 2nd door.

dialogues.speaker: IN. PLANE- DAY
dialogues.text: Reactions of some people who have heard the gunshots. Neerja looks concerned and shares a look with Debina and Tina- they all look scared. Sanjana and Dolly are surprised too. Neerja pushes Imran Ali to the side and moves towards the door but stops as she hears gun fire again. Neerja screams out.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Tina...Debina..Shut the door!! Shut it quickly!! Tina and Debina are slow to react and by the time they do the terrorists are inside the plane. Screaming and shouting among passengers near the front door. More screaming and shrieking from people at the back door as Fahad and Mansoor are hitting some passengers with their guns to get out of their way. Panic-stricken Dolly and Sanjana are pushed, shoved and slapped out of their way. Neerja reaches out to the phone and hides behind the galley as Khalil aggressively enters in and takes the left towards where he thinks the cockpit is.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: HIJACK. I repeat HIJACK
She is about to mention the word again when she is suddenly yanked by her hair. Neerja screams in pain and is forced to turn around- it is Khalil.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (gritting his teeth) Phone down. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Neerja is wincing in pain and Khalil is sadistically enjoying seeing her pained expression but is then ordered by Safirini.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (urgency in his voice) Cockpit. Khalil pushes Neerja away from the phone and goes in the direction of where he thinks the cockpit is. Safirini grabs hold of a crying Debina and Tina and pushes them in Neerja’s direction. Safirini shuts the door and screams out to Fahad and Mansoor to shut their door. Neerja is clearly shaken. Mansoor shuts the door quickly and takes his position at the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is just about breaking out on the horizon. The co-pilot is looking weirdly surprised at the pilot.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Did you hear it right??

dialogues.speaker: CO-PILOT
dialogues.text: Yes I did. They look at each other disbelievingly the Pilot pushes some buttons hurriedly.

dialogues.speaker: INT. PLANE AISLE- DAY
dialogues.text: Khalil is moving towards the cockpit with his gun. People around are cowering for security.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: What do we do? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CO-PILOT
dialogues.text: Let me go check.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: No you will not. We will stick to protocol. The Co-pilot has no other option but to follow the order.

dialogues.speaker: INT. AISLE- DAY
dialogues.text: Khalil is walking towards the curtains that part to enter the cock-pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil spreads the curtains apart and is stunned to see business class passengers sitting there. The passengers scream looking at him and the gun. He has a surprised look on his face. He rushes back through the scared business and first class passengers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safirini speaks out animatedly in Arabic.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: What are you doing here? get back to the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (spotting Neerja and pulling her by her neck) Come with me. Come to cockpit. As he pushes Neerja ahead of him he tells Safirini.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: There is no cockpit in front. It is upstairs. He again aggressively grabs Neerja by her neck and screaming out to the passengers to be seated, pushes Neerja upstairs. Safirini is turning his head left and right to see that no one is attempting to try anything funny. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He looks at the scared girls and holds Debina as a shield. Debina shrieks and Tina is scared too. Safirini shouts out.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: Hands Up..everybody hand up. Rahul Kumar gets up to stop Khalil.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yeh kya ho rahaa hain? Aap aisa nahi kar sakte. What are you doing? Rahul’s grandmother is pulling his hand to make him sit. But Rahul continues to protest.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Please stop this right now. Safirini angrily pushes the butt of his gun on Rahul’s face and he begins to bleed from his nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daylight begins to spread through the sky. Dramatic music playing and we can only see the 3 pilots in the cockpit discussing something with each other. One of them takes a fire-axe, his eyes nervously on the door.

dialogues.speaker: CO-PILOT
dialogues.text: (in a dilemma) Are you sure this is the right thing to do? The pilot is looking unsure

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neerja is leading Khalil [with his gun pointed at her] up the stairs. Maybe he is checking out her butt as she climbs up the stairs. Neerja can feel his eyes but is keeping her cool. The reach upstairs and all the passengers in the upper class begin panicking.

dialogues.speaker: INT. COCKPIT- DAY
dialogues.text: Hearing the voices outside

dialogues.speaker: CO-PILOT
dialogues.text: (freaking out) We need to decide faster.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: (making up his mind) It is decided. He looks at everyone in the cockpit and they all nod in agreement. They hear screams of passengers. 59 INT. OUTSIDE THE COCKPIT -— DAY Khalil barks, brandishing his gun, telling the passenger to shut up.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (orders Neerja) Darwaza khol. [to the passengers again, Screaming] chup, nahi toh goli He gestures a finger on his lips and then his gun as Neerja knocks on the cockpit door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilots inside are nervous and antsy. They hear Khalil instruct Neerja. The co-pilot is ready to strike the moment the door barges open as the other pilots huddle behind, doing some activity [which is not clear to the audience ]

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (ordering louder) Darwaza khol!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 61 INT. OUTSIDE THE COCKPIT -— DAY

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (trying to mask her fear) (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Sirf..sirf andar se khulta hain, mai nahi khol sakti She knocks the door again but there is no response. Khalil is not ready to wait anymore. He aggressively bangs the door. Neerja is palpitating looking at him bang the door hard, as if almost having an anxiety attack. Khalil begins to kick the door. He kicks the door hard. The passengers shriek. Neerja is sweating and heaving.

dialogues.speaker: INT. COCKPIT- DAY
dialogues.text: The co-pilot is ready to attack and while other pilots clicking some buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil kicks the door a few more times. Neerja is worried about what will happen if the door opens.

dialogues.speaker: INT. COCKPIT- DAY
dialogues.text: Everyone inside sweating and anticipating what is to come next.

dialogues.speaker: INT. OUTSIDE THE COCKPIT- DAY
dialogues.text: Khalil is relentlessly kicking the door. He lands another huge kick and the door slams open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil barges inside only to find the cockpit empty. Khalil looks around hoping to find the pilots hiding but it is empty. Neerja looks up at the open hatch above the pilot seat and is relieved. Khalil looks in the direction where Neerja is looking and spots the hatch. He climbs on the pilot seat and just and spots the pilots running towards the lounge. Khalil spots the emergency door open and rushes there and spots the pilots running towards the lounge. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They have reached quite a distance away. He sprays bullets in their direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilots are running zig-zag as fast as they can towards the lounge. As the ratatat of the bullets are heard they hide behind whatever shield source they can find around- Loading truck, A bus, a couple of them hide behind the moving staircase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil stops shooting and lets out an angry growl. He looks at Neerja with those angry eyes that suggest that she is responsible for this big twist in their plans. He closes the hatch, gets down and walks towards Neerja. As he closes in on her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT, DOHA _HOUSE/BATHROOM —DAY — DELETED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil holds Neerja’s neck and pushes her towards the wall behind. Neerja is choking, the passengers who can see all this taking place are shocked.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (angry) Yeh kaise bhaage, tumne signal diya Neerja is unable to reply and is holding Khalil’s hand trying to get him to loosen his grip. Khalil angrily pushes her out of the cockpit

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (angrily) Ek ek ko maar doonga. Panic and shrieking among the passengers as Neerja (still trying to catch her breath) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Dekho, aise karne se kuch solve nahi hoga

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: Chup!! Khalil looks at her angrily.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: [to the passengers] Utho sab, utho! Chalo neeche The passengers do as they are told. Neerja is telling them not to worry but it is clear from the passengers tears and fear on their faces that those words mean nothing. Neerja watches the passengers walk down the stairs while Khalil is breathing heavily with anger and staring at her. As the last passenger walks down Khalil pushes Neerja to walk down as well. Fear and dread on Neerja’s face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rama is chopping vegetables when suddenly she looks scared. Mother leaves the chopping mid-way and walks out of the kitchen. Tipsy is following the mother around. With a troubled expression she enters Neerja’s room. INT. NEERJA’S HOUSE- BEDROOM - DAY Rama looks around and slowly walks towards Neerja’s bedside and puts her hand in the gap between the pillow and the mattress. She slowly removes the hand out- reveal that she has Neerja’s ring. Fear on Rama’s face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil gets down the stairs and still holding Neerja as a shield, forces all the passengers from the Business and first Class seats towards the Economy section. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Daylight has filled the aircraft but for Neerja, things look as dark as a moonless night. Through her POV we see panic and shrieking continue as Fahad, Mansoor and Safirini are pulling, dragging, forcing the passengers sitting in the length of the plane to vacate their seats and gather in the middle section. She looks at her terrified air-hostess colleagues and looks scared too. People tumble, fall, dash into each other to escape from being hit by the butt of the guns which the terrorists are using to herd them to the centre. Chaos and fear as the terrorists keep screaming in Arabic to establish their authority. Khalil shouts out at Safirini from behind the scared people in the aisle walking towards the economy section.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: Pilots bach ke nikal gaye

dialogues.speaker: INT. AISLE- DAY
dialogues.text: All the passengers are herded like cattle in the middle section of the plane. Some of them are sitting in the middle of the Aisle. Neerja and the air-hostesses are made to sit separately in the business class section.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (angry whisper- Arabic) Kya matlab bach nikle? Kahaan se? Kaise? Neeche toh hum khade the, Khalil has no response and is feeling insulted. He looks angrily in Neerja’s direction who is pacifying the scared air hostesses.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Dhyaan kahaa hai tera??

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Cockpit upar hain yeh aap bhi nahi jaante the bhaijaan. toh baat mujh pe toh daaliye mat Safirini is mad as hell. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He turns back to the passengers and pointing his gun at them screams out in practiced English.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: This is hijack. No moving. Everyone scared , slowly put their hands up.

dialogues.speaker: MANSOOR
dialogues.text: (shouts out from his zone in Arabic) Kya kar rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: Kuch nahi sabh theek hai.

dialogues.speaker: FAHAD
dialogues.text: Toh Khalil bhi neeche kya kar rahein hai? Why aren’t we flying yet? Safirini is about to respond but before that Khalil shouts out

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Plane mein pilots nahi hain A passenger reacts to the word pilot

dialogues.speaker: FAHAD
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Kya? Ab Kya hoga?

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in Arabic) Pilots aa jaayenge, sab plan ke mutabik chalna hain, Jao, apni apni positions le lo. Jaldi! Safirini still worried about what to do next.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: hands up. Haath upar karo sab The passengers, scared and unsure of what is going to transpire next, do as they are told. One by One all their hands come above their heads.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (In Arabic) Agar plane nahi chalaa, toh iss sab ka kya faayda? Safirini just glares at Khalil and doesn’t reply (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd has gathered around the huffing and puffing pilots. Some passengers who were about to board the flight look relieved as they talk among themselves. The pilots are telling the cops about their ordeal. Suddenly there is a hush around the lounge. A group of commandoes walk through with an important looking man in the middle- Mr.Inzamam Younis. A no nonsense man with an air of authority around him with his suit and gelled back greying hair. A man on whom 55 years of experience sit very well. The airport security commandoes part the crowd of people and tell the pilots to join them. As Inzamam walks out he orders a few people.

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Shut the airport down, Right now. saare plane Lahore reroute kar do DO it now!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safirini and Khalil are looking worried and they are talking to each other in a hush hush tone. Reactions of Fahad and Mansoor. They looks scared too and are jumpy as if watching out for anyone who will make a move at them.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Bhai ab hum kya karenge? Plane chalaa nahi toh hum mar jaayenge Safirini reacts, he turns away to think of his options +

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Ab yahaan baith ke faayda kya hain. Pilot bhi bhaag gaye

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Shh! Chup! Fahad and Mansoor unsure about what is happening as they watch Khalil and Safirini discuss. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Safirini walks towards the air-hostesses and points at Debina

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: Idhar aa Debina rooted in her spot in fear starts crying and looks towards Neerja, Neerja looks scared too, Safirini holds up his gun

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: Suna nahi Debina weeps, Neerja takes a deep breath

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Mai in charge hoon, mujhse kaho Safirini looks at her, The girls are surprised.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: Announcement karni hain

dialogues.speaker: INT. KARACHI AIRPORT/LOUNGE- DAY
dialogues.text: Mr. Inzamam seems to have got the drift of things.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Sir there are 300 passengers in that plane.

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Did you leave the engine running?

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Yes sir, as per the hijack training procedure I did.

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Good

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New York New York playing on a loop- the silence is at a flashpoint. The passengers are still with their hands on their heads but they are all clearly tired of keeping them raised for so long. Neerja takes the intercom as Safirini is looking at the passengers. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: 54 Neerja is about to make an announcement when she looks at the people struggling to keep their hands up.

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (clearing her voice) Ladies and Gentlemen, iss waqt plane mein pilots nahi hain, the pilots have left so I am the commander of this plane..aap sabki zimmedaari ab meri hain.. Yeh..(she points at Safirini) inki dushmani aap se nahi hain. Aap mein se kissi ko kuch nahi hoga, No one will be harmed, Please please jaise mai baloon waisa kijiye, aaraam se apne haath neeche kijiye, please put your hands down slowly Safirini looks angrily at Neerja.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (angrily) No no haath upar

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: (negotiating) Unhe jitni tassalli milegi utna woh tumhare saath cooperate karenge. Tum yahi chahte ho na? She looks at him for an answer, he realizes she has a point.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Inzamam is walking around in the cabin room thinking what to do. He is getting some reports from the sub-ordinates in security uniforms and two other Pan Am officials.

dialogues.speaker: SUBORDINATE 1
dialogues.text: Janaab, plane main takreeban 44 Pakistani hain. 50 aur hone the, lekin unse pehle terrorist pahuch gaye....

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: (sternly) Maine poocha kitne pakistani hain? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SUBORDINATE 1
dialogues.text: (nervous ) Uh Nai, nai janaab, woh toh mai aise hi...99 Indian hain aur kaaafi American passport waale bhi hain...poori tafseel isme hain .. Inzamam snatches the file from the subordinate and scans through it.

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Tarmac jaane ka intezam karo, roof pe camera lagwaaon, get me a photo of the hijackers ATC tower mein do log har second plane pe nazar rakhenege... Inzamam walks out of the office cabin in a hurry.
Mansoor and Fahaad are nervously looking around and Khalil is getting antsy too.

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Hum Libya kaise pahuchenge? Inn logon ko yahi maar dete hain. Agar hum nahi pahuche, toh humaare yeh kaam, Ahmed Nidal aur Hanif Hussain ki jail se rihain dilwaa dega Safirini does not answer.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (in arabic) Inn passengers ko hum apne kabze mein rakh lete hain, zinda. Taaki woh log humaari baat maan jaaye Just then there is a voice heard from outside. It is Inzamam on the megaphone.

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Mera naam Inzamam Younis hain, hum tumhari madad karna chahte hain, Safirini and Khalil rush to the exit door and half open the window shutter to see Inzamam. Behind Fahad and Mansoor looks through the window too. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MANSOOR
dialogues.text: Fahad bhai yeh military to nahi hai na?

dialogues.speaker: FAHAD
dialogues.text: Chup kar darpok.

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Meri darkhwast hain ke passengers ko jaane diya jaaye ... Safirini looks at all the passengers and then screams out.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: Close shutter. All you close shutter. Khalil, Fahad and Mansoor begin ordering the same thing and poking the passengers near the windows with their gun barrels. Mansoor forces Dolly to her feet and pushes her to the back area and orders her to shut the window. Long shot of the shutters stopping the sunlight from streaming in. All of them are now trapped inside. Khalil quickly drags Tina to the front section and orders her to close all the shutters. She is scared as hell but does as she is ordered to. He keeps shouting at her. Once she is done he drags her back and throws her on the seat. Safirini is thinking what to do. Khalil is anxious

dialogues.speaker: KHALIL
dialogues.text: (In arabic) Ispe goli chalaa de, tabhi pilot aayenge As Inzamam continues to reiterate his plea..

dialogues.speaker: INZAMAM
dialogues.text: Tumhari maange sunne ke liye mai yahaan hoon. Plane mai baithe logo ko iske beech mat laao, unhe chhod do, hum tumhari jo madad ho sake karenge

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (In Arabic) Nahi.Jab tak pilot nahi aate, isse baat jaari rakhte hain.  80 57

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Khalil is fuming. Safirini looks at Neerja. He goes towards the airhostess.

dialogues.speaker: SAFIRINI
dialogues.text: (broken hindi) ATC tower mein radio se ...connection..poochon radio operate karna kisko aata hain He picks Neerja and pulls her towards the PA system. Fahad and Mansoor from behind walk through the aisle asking. RADIO...RADIO..

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Passengers mein koi hain jisse radio operate karna aata hain? Imran Ali- the radio engineer is looking at Neerja and is about to get up from his seat when Neerja repeats the announcement

dialogues.speaker: NEERJA
dialogues.text: Cockpit ka radio kissi ko operate karna aata hain toh please haath upar kijiye She signals him not to get up by shaking her head side to side. Safirini looks around and sees that there is no one. He looks out through the glass window on the door and watches Inzamam and then making up his mind, walks towards the aisle. Brandishing his gun, he begins scanning around. The Passengers are cowering and shielding themselves or their loved ones sitting next to them. He reaches Rahul Kumar, remembers him from earlier and holds him by his collar.
